issue.title: X1 and X2 are pushed by wind

content.raw:
I was using the competition launch file. I noticed it because the X1 would drift a few centimeters every couple of seconds when the wind was enabled in gazebo. Seems like this would be reasonable for the X3s and X4s but i'm guessing the likely very heavy X1s and X2s would not be moved when stationary by normal wind.

Perhaps you could set


```
#!xml

  <gazebo>
    <enable_wind>false</enable_wind>
  </gazebo>
```
in the x1.urdf.xacro  and x2.urdf.xacro? Without some sensible friction modeled, the modeling of the wind won't affect the wheeled robots realistically.
